sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Methamphetamine Manufacturer Registry Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Methamphetamine Manufacturer Registry Act.

sections.heading: Definition. As used in this Act, "methamphetamine manufacturer" means a person who has been convicted of any violation of Section 15 of the Methamphetamine Control and Community Protection Act
sections.text: Definition. As used in this Act, "methamphetamine manufacturer" means a person who has been convicted of any violation of Section 15 of the Methamphetamine Control and Community Protection Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
